verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> on Neginoth <WH5058>, A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892>. 'Elohim <WH430> be merciful <WH2603> <WH8799> unto us, and bless <WH1288> <WH8762> us; and cause his face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> <WH8686> upon us; Selah <WH5542>.
That thy way <WH1870> may be known <WH3045> <WH8800> upon earth <WH776>, thy saving health <WH3444> among all nations <WH1471>.
Let the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O 'Elohim <WH430>; let all the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee.

O let the nations <WH3816> be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> and sing for joy <WH7442> <WH8762>: for thou shalt judge <WH8199> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> righteously <WH4334>, and govern <WH5148> <WH8686> the nations <WH3816> upon earth <WH776>. Selah <WH5542>.
Let the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee, O 'Elohim <WH430>; let all the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee.
Then shall the earth <WH776> yield <WH5414> <WH8804> her increase <WH2981>; and 'Elohim <WH430>, even our own 'Elohim <WH430>, shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> us.
'Elohim <WH430> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> us; and all the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> him.
